privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Formora, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. We collect only the information necessary to provide our services and do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.informationDescription: We collect information you provide directly when creating forms or signing up. This may include your name, email address, and form data.
privacy.usageDescription: We use your information to operate, maintain, and improve Formoraâ€™s services. Your data is not shared externally without your consent, unless required by law.
privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at
